Traits.Name: Pack Tactics
Traits.Content: The warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Actions.Name: Spear
Actions.Content: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Traits.Name: Invisible in Water
Traits.Content: The water weird is invisible when fully immersed in water

Traits.Name: Water Bound
Traits.Content: The water weird dies if it leaves the water to which it is bound or if that water is destroyed

Actions.Name: Constrict
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 13) and pulled 5 feet toward the water weird. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, the water weird tries to drown it, and the water weird can’t constrict another target.

Creatures.3gstggi9.Name: Hare
Creatures.3gstggi9.Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

Traits.Name: Escape
Traits.Content: The hare can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

Creatures.3my4b4v6.Name: Verbeeg Marauder
Creatures.3my4b4v6.Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

Traits.Name: Simple Weapon Wielder
Traits.Content: A simple weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the verbeeg hits with it (included in the attack).

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The verbeeg makes two attacks

Actions.Name: Spear
Actions.Content: _Melee or Ranged Weapon_: +6 to hit, reach 5ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 14 (3d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage if used to make a ranged attack or used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Creatures.47gycigv.Name: Yeti Tyke
Creatures.47gycigv.Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

Traits.Name: Keen Smell
Traits.Content: The yeti has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Traits.Name: Snow Camoflauge
Traits.Content: The yeti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

Actions.Name: Claw
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) cold damage.

Traits.Name: Nimble Escape
Traits.Content: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The goblin makes two attacks with its scimitar. The second attack has disadvantage.

Actions.Name: Scimitar
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

Actions.Name: Shortbow
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Reactions.Name: Redirect Attack
Reactions.Content: When a creature the goblin can see targets it with an attack, the goblin chooses another goblin within 5 feet of it. The two goblins swap places, and the chosen goblin becomes the target instead.

Creatures.96p8bs4q.Name: Frost Giant Skeleton
Creatures.96p8bs4q.Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

Traits.Name: Unusual Nature
Traits.Content: The skeleton doesn’t require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The skeleton makes two greataxe attacks.

Actions.Name: Greataxe
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage.

Actions.Name: Freezing Stare
Actions.Content: The skeleton targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 35 (10d6) cold damage and be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

Creatures.Creatures.Creatures.2fp8gprz.Name: Zombie - Bloater
Languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

Traits.Name: Bloat Burst
Traits.Content: After 1d4 - 0 turns, the bloated zombie's body bursts in a 15ft. radius causing 1d6 poison damage and requiring all targets to make a DEX 13 Save or take the poisoned effect.

Actions.Name: Slam
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

Traits.Name: Swarm
Traits.Content: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny Limb. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

Traits.Name: Unusual Nature
Traits.Content: The swarm doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The swarm makes one Undead Mass attack and one Grasping Limbs attack.

Actions.Name: Undead Mass
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 0ft., one target in the swarm's space. _Hit_: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

Actions.Name: Grasping Limbs
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 0ft., one creature in the swarm's space. _Hit:_ 7 (2d6) necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a DC 12 Strength Saving Throw or be restrained. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, taking 7 (2d6) necrotic damage on a failed save. The creature is freed if it succeeds on this saving throw, the swarm moves out of the creature's space, or the swarm dies.

Creatures.Creatures.Creatures.p9f6agt1.Name: Zombie - Contagious
Languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

Traits.Name: Undead Fortitude
Traits.Content: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

Actions.Name: Slam
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage. Target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution Saving Throw or become infected with Brain Rot

Traits.Name: Innate Spellcasting
Traits.Content:
The goblin shaman’s innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +8 to hit with spell attacks). The goblin shaman can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components.

At will: fire bolt, message
1st Level (2/day): burning hands, charm person, detect thoughts, sleep
2nd Level (1/day): fireball, lightning bolt

Traits.Name: Magic Resistance
Traits.Content: The goblin shaman has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Traits.Name: Nimble Escape
Traits.Content: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

Traits.Name: Wild Magic
Traits.Content: The goblin must roll a 1d100 on the Wild Magic Surge table anytime a spell, including cantrips, is cast.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The goblin shaman makes two attacks with its goat staff

Actions.Name: Goat Staff
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

Traits.Name: Sure-Footed
Traits.Content: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

Actions.Name: Ram
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

Creatures.fpx5qixm.Name: Yeti
Creatures.fpx5qixm.Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

Traits.Name: Fear of Fire
Traits.Content: If the yeti takes fire damage, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

Traits.Name: Keen Smell
Traits.Content: The yeti has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

Traits.Name: Snow Camoflauge
Traits.Content: The yeti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The yeti can use its Chilling Gaze and makes two claw attacks.

Actions.Name: Claw
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) cold damage.

Actions.Name: Chilling Gaze
Actions.Content: The yeti targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw against this magic or take 10 (3d6) cold damage and then be paralyzed for 1 minute, unless it is immune to cold damage. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target’s saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to the Chilling Gaze of all yetis (but not abominable yetis) for 1 hour.

Actions.Name: Beak
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

Traits.Name: Evasion
Traits.Content: When the chwinga is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

Traits.Name: Innate Spellcasting
Traits.Content:
The chwinga’s innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material or verbal components:

• At will: druidcraft, guidance, pass without trace, resistance

Traits.Name: Unusual Nature
Traits.Content: The chwinga doesn’t require air, food, or drink. When it dies, it turns into a handful of flower petals, a cloud of pollen, a stone statuette resembling its former self, a tiny sphere of smooth stone, or a puddle of fresh water (your choice).

Actions.Name: Druidcraft
Actions.Content:
Whispering to the spirits of nature, you create one of the following effects within range:
- You create a tiny, harmless sensory effect that predicts what the weather will be at your location for the next 24 hours. The effect might manifest as a golden orb for clear skies, a cloud for rain, falling snowflakes for snow, and so on. This effect persists for 1 round.
- You instantly make a flower blossom, a seed pod open, or a leaf bud bloom.
- You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as falling leaves, a puff of wind, the sound of a small animal, or the faint odor of skunk. The effect must fit in a 5-foot cube.
- You instantly light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.

Actions.Name: Guidance
Actions.Content: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one ability check of its choice. It can roll the die before or after making the ability check. The spell then ends.

Actions.Name: Pass Without a Trace
Actions.Content: A veil of shadows and silence radiates from you, masking you and your companions from detection. For the duration, each creature you choose within 30 feet of you (including you) has a +10 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks and can't be tracked except by magical means. A creature that receives this bonus leaves behind no tracks or other traces of its passage.

Actions.Name: Resistance
Actions.Content: You touch one willing creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to one saving throw of its choice. It can roll the die before or after the saving throw. The spell then ends.

Actions.Name: Magical Gift (1/Day)
Actions.Content: The chwinga targets a humanoid it can see within 5 feet of it. The target gains a supernatural charm of the DM’s choice. See the Dungeon Master’s Guide for information on supernatural charms.

Actions.Name: Natural Shelter
Actions.Content: The chwinga magically takes shelter inside a rock, a living plant, or a natural source of fresh water in its space. The chwinga can’t be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect while inside this shelter, and the shelter doesn’t impair the chwinga’s blindsight. The chwinga can use its action to emerge from a shelter. If its shelter is destroyed, the chwinga is forced out and appears in the shelter’s space, but is otherwise unharmed..

Creatures.z2ra50r2.Name: Crag Cat
Creatures.z2ra50r2.Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

Traits.Name: Nondetection
Traits.Content: The cat can't be targeted or detected by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

Traits.Name: Pounce
Traits.Content: If the cat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the cat can make one bite attack against is as a bonus action.

Traits.Name: Spell Turning
Traits.Content: The cat has advantage on Saving Throws against any spell that targets only the cat (not an area). If the cat's saving throw succeeds and the spell is of 7th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the cat and instead targets the caster.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack_: +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. _Hit_: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Claw
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack_: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit_: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

Spells.5bc468i5.Name: Crown of Madness
Spells.5bc468i5.Description:
One humanoid of your choice that you can see within range must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become charmed by you for the duration.

While the target is charmed in this way, a twisted crown of jagged iron appears on its head, and a madness glows in its eyes.

The charmed target must use its action before moving on each of its turns to make a melee attack against a creature other than itself that you mentally choose. The target can act normally on its turn if you choose no creature or if none are within its reach.

On your subsequent turns, you must use your action to maintain control over the target, or the spell ends. Also, the target can make a Wisdom saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a success, the spell ends.

Spells.5p9ain7e.Name: Chromatic Orb
Spells.5p9ain7e.Components: V, S, M (a diamond worth at least 50 gp)
Spells.5p9ain7e.Description:
You hurl a 4-inch-diameter sphere of energy at a creature that you can see within range. You choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder for the type of orb you create, and then make a ranged spell attack against the target. If the attack hits, the creature takes 3d8 damage of the type you chose.

**At Higher Levels.** When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

Traits.Name: Colossus Slayer
Traits.Content: Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a weapon attack, the creature takes an extra 1d8 damage if it’s below its HP maximum.

Traits.Name: Primeval Awareness
Traits.Content: As an action, you can expend one ranger spell slot (1 minute per level of spell slot) to sense whether any aberrations, celestials, dragons, elementals, fey, fiends, or undead are present within 1 mile of you (or within up to 6 miles if you are in your favored terrain). This feature doesn’t reveal the creatures’ location or number.

Actions.Name: Longbow
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Scimitar
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

StatBlock.Name: Spellix Romwod
StatBlock.Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

Traits.Name: Gnome Cunning
Traits.Content: Spellix has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

Traits.Name: Innate Spellcasting
Traits.Content:
Spellix's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

At will: fire bolt, mage hand, shocking grasp
1st Level (3/day): silent image
2nd Level (1/day): chromatic orb, crown of madness, shield

Actions.Name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
Actions.Content: Melee Spell Attack: +5 to hit (with advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one create. Hit: 4 (1d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
Actions.Content: Ranged Spell Attack: +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.

Traits.Name: Divine Sense
Traits.Content: As an action, you can detect good and evil. Until the end of your next turn, you can sense anything affected by the hallow spell or know the location of any celestial, fiend, undead within 60 ft. that is not behind total cover. You can use this feature 3 times per long rest.

Traits.Name: Lay on Hands
Traits.Content: You have a pool of healing power that can restore 5 HP per long rest. As an action, you can touch a creature to restore any number of HP remaining in the pool, or 5 HP to either cure a disease or neutralize a poison affecting the creature.

Traits.Name: Constructed Resilience
Traits.Content:
You have advantage on saving throws against being poisoned, and you have resistance to poison damage.

You don’t need to eat, drink, or breathe. You are immune to disease. You don’t need to sleep, and magic can’t put you to sleep.

Traits.Name: Sentry's Rest
Traits.Content: When you take a long rest, you must spend at least six hours in an inactive, motionless state, rather than sleeping. In this state, you appear inert, but it doesn’t render you unconscious, and you can see and hear as normal.

Traits.Name: Integrated Protection
Traits.Content:
You gain a +1 bonus to Armor Class. To don or doff armor other than a shield takes 1 hour, and you must be proficient with the armor.

While you live, your incorporated armor can’t be removed from your body against your will.

StatBlock.Name: Skath
StatBlock.Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: Skath makes two longsword attacks. If he has a shortsword drawn, he can also make a shortsword attack.

Actions.Name: Longsword
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Actions.Name: Shortsword
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Heavy Crossbow
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Shortsword
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5ft. one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage

Traits.Name: Brave
Traits.Content: The gladiator has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

Traits.Name: Brute
Traits.Content: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gladiator hits with it (included in the attack).

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The gladiator makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

Actions.Name: Spear
Actions.Content: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. and range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Actions.Name: Shield Bash
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Reactions.Name: Parry
Reactions.Content: The gladiator adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the gladiator must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

StatBlock.Name: Sephek Kaltro
StatBlock.Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

Traits.Name: Innate Spellcasting
Traits.Content: Sephek can innately cast _misty step_ up to three times per day, requiring no components. His innate spell casting ability is Charisma

Traits.Name: Cold Regeneration
Traits.Content: If the temperature around him is 0 degrees Fahrenheit or lower, Sephek regains 5 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of Sephek's next turn. Sephek dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: Sephek attacks twice with a weapons

Actions.Name: Ice Longsword
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit_ 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if Sephek uses the weapon with two hands, plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.

Actions.Name: Ice Dagger
Actions.Content: _Ranged Weapon Attack_ +5 to hit, reach 5ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.

StatBlock.Name: Sildar Hallwinter

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: Sildar makes two melee attacks

Actions.Name: Longsword
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack_: +3 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. _Hit_: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

Actions.Name: Heavy Crossbow
Actions.Content: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +2 to hit, range 100 ft./400 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

Reactions.Name: Parry
Reactions.Content: When an attacker hits Sildar with a melee attack and Sildar can see the attacker, he can roll 1d6 and add the number rolled to his AC against the triggering attack, provided that he’s wielding a melee weapon.

StatBlock.Description: Sildar Hallwinter is a retired soldier and sellsword who hails from the city of Neverwinter. He is a loyal member of the Lords’ Alliance, a political organization that unites the various free cities and towns of the North.

Traits.Name: Brute
Traits.Content: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the gladiator hits with it (included in the attack).

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The gladiator makes three melee attacks.

Actions.Name: Warhammer
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

Actions.Name: Shield Bash
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and Jarund pushes the target 5 feet away from him if it's Large or smaller. Jarund then enters the space vacated by the target. If the target is pushed to within 5 feet of a creature friendly to Jarund, that creature can make an attack against the target as a reaction.

Actions.Name: Javelin
Actions.Content: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

PersistentCharacters.9q7ebh6r.Name: Sir Elliot Roland (Riverbend - Sergeant of the Guard)

StatBlock.Name: Sir Elliot Roland (Riverbend - Sergeant of the Guard)

Actions.Name: Longsword
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Actions.Name: Shortbow
Actions.Content: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

LegendaryActions.Name: Action Surge
LegendaryActions.Content: _(3 charges per long rest)_ The captain makes two melee attacks.

StatBlock.Name: Prudence Tarkwold
StatBlock.Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

Traits.Name: Cunning Action
Traits.Content: On each of her turns, Prudence can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

Traits.Name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
Traits.Content: Prudence deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of Prudence that isn't incapacitated and Prudence doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: Prudencev makes two melee attacks.

Actions.Name: Shortsword
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Hand Crossbow
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

StatBlock.Name: Naerth Maxildanarr
StatBlock.Source: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

Traits.Name: Cunning Action
Traits.Content: On each of his turns, Naerth can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

Traits.Name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
Traits.Content: Naerth deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 ft. of an ally of Naerth that isn't incapacitated and Naerth doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: Naerth makes two melee attacks.

Actions.Name: Shortsword
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Hand Crossbow
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Traits.Name: Keen Hearing and Sight
Traits.Content: The Investigator has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight

Actions.Name: Whip
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage

Actions.Name: Dagger
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage

Actions.Name: Hand Crossbow
Actions.Content: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage

LegendaryActions.Name: Cunning Action
LegendaryActions.Content: On each of its turns, the investigator can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide Action

LegendaryActions.Name: Helpful
LegendaryActions.Content: The Investigator is adept at giving well-timed assistance; the investigator can take the Help action as a bonus action

Traits.Name: Dwarven Resilience
Traits.Content: Has advantage on saving throws against poison

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The captain makes three melee attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its dagger. Or the captain makes two ranged attacks with its daggers.

Actions.Name: Scimitar
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Actions.Name: Dagger
Actions.Content: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

Reactions.Name: Parry
Reactions.Content: The captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

Traits.Name: Keen Hearing and Sight
Traits.Content: The scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The scout makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

Actions.Name: Dagger
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Crossbow, Hand
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, ranged 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Rapier
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Lance
Actions.Content:
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage

Special: You have disadvantage when you use a lance to Attack a target within 5 feet of you. Also, a lance requires two hands to wield when you aren't mounted.

LegendaryActions.Name: Helpful
LegendaryActions.Content: The sidekick is adept at giving well-timed assistance; the sidekick can take the Help action as a bonus action.

LegendaryActions.Name: Cunning Action
LegendaryActions.Content: The sidekick's agility or quick thinking allows it to act speedily. On its turn in combat, it can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide Action as a Bonus Action

Actions.Name: Longsword
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. _Hit:_ 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

Actions.Name: Longbow
Actions.Content: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, ranged 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage

Actions.Name: Dagger
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit 4 (1d4 + 2)

Reactions.Name: Helpful
Reactions.Content: Can take the Help action as a reaction

LegendaryActions.Name: Keen Hearing and Sight
LegendaryActions.Content: Has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight

Traits.Name: Nimble Escape
Traits.Content: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

Actions.Name: Scimitar
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

Actions.Name: Shortbow
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

PersistentCharacters.r83bkqk0.Name: The Fingers
PersistentCharacters.r83bkqk0.SearchHint: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

StatBlock.Name: The Fingers
StatBlock.Type: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

Actions.Name: Dagger
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

Actions.Name: Heavy Crossbow
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

Traits.Name: Channel Divinity: Turn Undead
Traits.Content:
As an action, you present your holy symbol and speak a prayer censuring the undead. Each undead that can see or hear you within 30 feet of you must make a Wisdom saving throw. If the creature fails its saving throw, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

A turned creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from you as it can, and it can’t willingly move to a space within 30 feet of you. It also can’t take reactions. For its action, it can use only the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If there’s nowhere to move, the creature can use the Dodge action.

Traits.Name: Channel Divinity: Knowledge of the Ages
Traits.Content: Starting at 2nd level, you can use your Channel Divinity to tap into a divine well of knowledge. As an action, you choose one skill or tool. For 10 minutes, you have proficiency with the chosen skill or tool.

Traits.Name: War Caster
Traits.Content: You have advantage on CON saving throws that you make to maintain your concentration on a spell when you take damage. You can perform the somatic components of spells even when you have weapons or a shield in one or both hands. You can use your reaction to make an opportunity attack to cast a spell that has a casting time of 1 action and targets only that creature.

Actions.Name: Sacred Flame
Actions.Content: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature that you can see within 60 ft. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.

Actions.Name: Toll the Dead
Actions.Content: You point at one creature you can see within 60 ft., and the sound of a dolorous bell fills the air around it for a moment. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 1d8 necrotic damage. If the target is missing any of its hit points, it instead takes 1d12 necrotic damage.

Actions.Name: Guiding Bolt
Actions.Content: A flash of light streaks toward a creature of your choice within range. Make a ranged spell attack (+5) against the target. On a hit, the target takes 4d6 radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against this target before the end of your next turn has advantage, thanks to the mystical dim light glittering on the target until then.

BonusActions.Name: Spiritual Weapon
BonusActions.Content:
You create a floating, spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack (+5) against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon. On a hit, the target takes force damage equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the weapon up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it.

The weapon can take whatever form you choose. Clerics of deities who are associated with a particular weapon (as St. Cuthbert is known for his mace and Thor for his hammer) make this spell's effect resemble that weapon.

Actions.Name: Dagger
Actions.Content: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

LegendaryActions.Name: Disengage
LegendaryActions.Content: _As a Bonus Action_, you take the Disengage Action

PersistentCharacters.xkxpz3hz.Name: Strixis Black (Gladdhead - Cult Leader)
PersistentCharacters.xkxpz3hz.SearchHint: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

StatBlock.Name: Strixis Black (Gladdhead - Cult Leader)
StatBlock.Type: Medium humanoid (any race), any non-good alignment

Traits.Name: Dark Devotion
Traits.Content: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content:
The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spell casting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks). The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared: 

Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
• 1st level (4 slots): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith
• 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon

Actions.Name: Multiattack
Actions.Content: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.

Actions.Name: Dagger
Actions.Content: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: [Light] (Cantrip)
Actions.Content:
[You touch one object](https://www.dndbeyond.com/spells/light) that is no larger than 10 feet in any dimension. Until the spell ends, the object sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The light can be colored as you like. Completely covering the object with something opaque blocks the light. The spell ends if you cast it again or dismiss it as an action.

If you target an object held or worn by a hostile creature, that creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw to avoid the spell.

Actions.Name: Sacred Flame (Cantrip)
Actions.Content: [Flame-like radiance descends](https://www.dndbeyond.com/spells/sacred-flame) on a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 radiant damage. The target gains no benefit from cover for this saving throw.

Actions.Name: Thaumaturgy (Cantrip)
Actions.Content:
[You manifest a minor wonder](https://www.dndbeyond.com/spells/thaumaturgy), a sign of supernatural power, within range. You create one of the following magical effects within range:

- Your voice booms up to three times as loud as normal for 1 minute.
- You cause flames to flicker, brighten, dim, or change color for 1 minute.
- You cause harmless tremors in the ground for 1 minute.
- You create an instantaneous sound that originates from a point of your choice within range, such as a rumble of thunder, the cry of a raven, or ominous whispers.
- You instantaneously cause an unlocked door or window to fly open or slam shut.
- You alter the appearance of your eyes for 1 minute.

If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its 1-minute effects active at a time, and you can dismiss such an effect as an action.

Actions.Name: Command (1st Level)
Actions.Content:
[You speak a one-word command](https://www.dndbeyond.com/spells/command) to a creature you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on its next turn. The spell has no effect if the target is undead, if it doesn't understand your language, or if your command is directly harmful to it.

Some typical commands and their effects follow. You might issue a command other than one described here. If you do so, the GM determines how the target behaves. If the target can't follow your command, the spell ends.

**Approach.** The target moves toward you by the shortest and most direct route, ending its turn if it moves within 5 feet of you.

**Drop.** The target drops whatever it is holding and then ends its turn.

**Flee.** The target spends its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means.

**Grovel.** The target falls prone and then ends its turn.

**Halt.** The target doesn't move and takes no actions. A flying creature stays aloft, provided that it is able to do so. If it must move to stay aloft, it flies the minimum distance needed to remain in the air.

Actions.Name: Inflict Wounds (1st Level)
Actions.Content: [Make a melee spell attack](https://www.dndbeyond.com/spells/inflict-wounds) against a creature you can reach. On a hit, the target takes 3d10 necrotic damage.

Actions.Name: Shield of Faith (1st Level - C)
Actions.Content: [A shimmering field](https://www.dndbeyond.com/spells/shield-of-faith) appears and surrounds a creature of your choice within range, granting it a +2 bonus to AC for the duration.

Actions.Name: Hold Person (2nd Level - C)
Actions.Content: [Choose a humanoid](https://www.dndbeyond.com/spells/hold-person) that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

Actions.Name: Spiritual Weapon (2nd Level)
Actions.Content:
[You create a floating](https://www.dndbeyond.com/spells/spiritual-weapon), spectral weapon within range that lasts for the duration or until you cast this spell again. When you cast the spell, you can make a melee spell attack against a creature within 5 feet of the weapon. On a hit, the target takes force damage equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.

As a bonus action on your turn, you can move the weapon up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it.

The weapon can take whatever form you choose. Clerics of deities who are associated with a particular weapon (as St. Cuthbert is known for his mace and Thor for his hammer) make this spell's effect resemble that weapon.

Traits.Name: Spellcasting
Traits.Content:
The druid is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

• Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh
• 1st level (4 slots): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave
• 2nd level (3 slots): animal messenger, barkskin

Actions.Name: Quarterstaff
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.

Traits.Name: Cavalry Charge
Traits.Content: If the dragonborn moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature while mounted and then hits with a lance attack on the same turn, it can make a trample attack against that creature as a bonus action.

Actions.Name: Lance
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Heavy Crossbow
Actions.Content: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

Actions.Name: Trample (Mounted Only)
Actions.Content: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Traits.Name: Keen Hearing and Sight
Traits.Content: Sora has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell

Traits.Name: Pack Tactics
Traits.Content: Sora has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the her allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

Traits.Name: Bonus Proficiencies
Traits.Content: Sora is proficient with all Armor

Traits.Name: Improved Critical
Traits.Content: Sora's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

Actions.Name: Bite
Actions.Content:
_Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5ft., one target.
_Hit:_ 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength Saving Throw or be knocked prone.

BonusActions.Name: Second Wind (Warrior Sidekick Lvl 2)
BonusActions.Content: As a bonus action, regain hit points equal to 1d10 + Sora's Level in this class. Once this feature is used, Sora must complete a short or long rest before it can be used again.

Reactions.Name: Defender (Warrior Sidekick Lvl 1)
Reactions.Content: Sora can use her reaction to impose disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of it whose target isn't Sora, provided Sora can see the attacker
